description: UMD 4.7.2 is a fix release of the fourth Major release of UMD. It add the missing package bouncycastle1.58-pkix.&nbsp;
releaseNotes: This release just adds the missing package bouncycastle1.58-pkix
installationNotes: All products in UMD 4.7.2 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: operations (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the <a href="https://ggus.eu/">EGI Helpdesk</a>&nbsp;to make a report.
knownIssues: Please visit <a style="color:#3465A4" href="https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-4:UMD-4.7.2">https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-4:UMD-4.7.2</a> for known issues.
changeLog: This release just adds the missing package bouncycastle1.58-pkix
